notes: Excellent modern apartment in pristine condition with high-end finishes including recessed lighting, central air conditioning, modern leather sofa, and sleek white kitchen with gas cooktop. Very clean and spacious at nearly 40 ping. For baby safety: balcony has proper railings visible through sliding doors, furniture has rounded edges, and floors are smooth tile throughout. Natural light appears decent with floor-to-ceiling windows in living room and bedroom. No red flags - this is a premium unit managed by UR House rental services.
